name: Siren

trait.name: Amphibious
text: Siren can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Siren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: Siren's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: charm person, fog cloud, greater invisibility, polymorph (self only)

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Stupefying Touch
text: Siren touches one creature she can see within 5 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or take 13 (3d6 + 3) psychic damage and be stunned until the start of Siren's next turn.

spells: charm person, fog cloud, greater invisibility, polymorph
description: Source: Tales from the Yawning Portal p. 243, Mythic Odysseys of Theros
